objects.specification: A smooth neutral-toned floor panel with subtle texture reminiscent of polished concrete or laminate, offering a clean and even surface with a low-gloss finish.
A smooth neutral-toned wall panel with matte finish and minimal texture, featuring a wide open entrance in the center without a door, creating an inviting passage into the booth.

children.specification: A large wooden archway with a gently curved top, crafted from smooth planks in warm wood tones, offering a sturdy decorative frame around the entrance.
A colorful fabric banner stretched across the top of the arch, featuring vibrant hues and bold graphics, with reinforced edges and a slight drape for natural movement.

objects.specification: A smooth neutral-toned back wall panel with matte finish and minimal texture, providing a clean backdrop at the rear of the booth.
A smooth neutral-toned side wall panel with matte finish and minimal texture, forming the left enclosure of the booth.
A smooth neutral-toned side wall panel with matte finish and minimal texture, forming the right enclosure of the booth.

A reception desk built from smooth wooden planks with a warm wood finish, featuring a rectangular top supported by sturdy plank legs; on top sits a sleek flat-screen computer monitor with a slim black frame and a minimalist brochure stand with multiple angled slots.
A small round table with a warm wood top, smooth polished surface, and a single slender cylindrical wooden leg ending in a stable circular base.

A visitor chair with a warm wood frame, curved backrest and seat, smooth finish, and four slender legs.
